title: Graves is giving me a headache/seizures to come  @Riot
body: Pool part graves crits. They flash so bright it lights up my whole screen. I have a huge headache now from that. Someone is going to havea  seizure. Also why does corki's siren sound like a actually bomb warning. That horrifies me.

replies.body:
Hey LordFluffyJr,

Thanks for the report! ^-^

We're aware of the issue with Graves and are working on a fix! 

**Edit** - Corki changes are being made. [Source](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/d0oKyxKw-corkis-special-delivery-sfx).
I am literally the worst today. Fixed!
Actually, Eno said that Corki's Special Delivery sound _will_ change. :P
I'm pretty sure its a rocket warning
Where I'm from it sounds like the siren the put off when there is a gas leak in the city. It scared the crap out of me the first time!

Well it is a standart alert for alot of cities...

But i already knew it was in the game.. even with my stereo system..

Maybe it was BECAUSE of your stereo system.

If mine wasn't kinda bad, I'd have had some real scary thoughts the first time.
My stereo system involve my girlfriends old apple ear buds! LOL
